Posts.Content: this is a great website for mastecomy bras    nicola jane mastectomy bras
Posts.Title: comfy bra

Posts.Content: im gonna have to bookmark it,, looks like it will be a big help  xx
Posts.Title: Chemotherapy Tips

Posts.Content: thanks misty,, just getting paranoid now that the results from the lymph node clearance will show cancer is everywhere, no reason why but just got it my head now, i need to snap out of,, (easier said than done),,
Posts.Title: on a proper downer :(

Posts.Content: omg since yesterday i have felt the lowest i have ever felt in my life, a real poor me mood, i have never had a mood like it,, i have had a mx in jan then node clearance 2 weeks ago, results of the node clearance are due on wednesday and i think thats whats getting to me as all results i have been given since 2nd jan have been bad news so kind of expecting them to give me bad news,, i havent had any chemo yet but that is defo on the cards i know that,,, i know if i went to the doctors with the mood im in i would probably be admitted to the local high security unit,,  sorry to be so woooo is me,, need to know im normal xx
Posts.Title: on a proper downer :(

Posts.Content: thanks,, when i had my mx they took 2 nodes, first showed cancer the next 1 showed a tiny trace, but  she gave me a full node clearance to be sure i was all out,, now what is on my mind is i have no idea what the results are gonna show, is it to determine the type of chemo?  could it show if its gone elsewhere? is it going to grade the cancer? i know nothing really only i had a 3cm lump of cancer and 2 lymph nodes affected,,,  im feeling better already thanks guys, its just thinking im on my own in this but i know i'm not :) xx
Posts.Title: on a proper downer :(

Posts.Content: thanks guys,, talk about mood swings wooooosh,, off to docs tomorrow for a little chat
Posts.Title: on a proper downer :(

Posts.Content: has she got children?  hope you are coping well xx
Posts.Title: 25 year old and breast cancer

Posts.Content: hi it will be FEC-T,  im happy with the results, i expected more nodes and they thought it was 5cm , so this afternoon was such a huge relief x, hope all goes well for tuesday
Posts.Title: results are in :)

Posts.Content: hi got my results in and im pretty pleased (as i can be ) 31mm grade 2 invasive ductal 3/16 nodes affected er/pr poss her2 neg   i dont need radiotherapy but have been invited to take part in a trial for radiotherapy ,, next step chemo .................
Posts.Title: results are in :)

Posts.Content: hi im 43 i got my diagnosis on the 2nd of jan,, im waiting to have a mastectomy on the 25th jan,, it all moves so quickly,, might not be a good idea for everyone but went to my gp and have got myself some sleeping pills for night time because i did spend 3 nights wide awake thinking the worse, i feel calmer about it all now, i will stop taking them once i have my op,, maybe not the words of wisdom you want but words of i know where you're at sister and with you x
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed - feeling lost

Posts.Content: thanks debbie,,yes i am learning every day about everything,,good luck on the 28th xx i will be having chemo about 3 weeks after the boob going,, then i get a new boob later in the year x, i have my pre op on wednesday, so need to write all my questions down to ask my cancer nurse, she rang me today to see how i was and if i had any questions all i could think of was a feeble "will it hurt?" lol,,
Posts.Title: Newly diagnosed - feeling lost

Posts.Content: i'm just grabbing everything they offer me even trials,,
Posts.Title: Chemo decision, advice required

Posts.Content: my favourite saying,, i not stopped saying it lately
Posts.Title: Feels empty here
